quote: Now Jehovah God had been forming from the ground every wild animal of the field and every flying creature of the heavens, and he began bringing them to the man to see what he would call each one; and whatever the man would call each living creature, that became its name.
They replied: “A certain Egyptian rescued us from the shepherds, and he even drew water for us and watered the flock.”
but Mary began to preserve all these sayings, drawing conclusions in her heart.
